channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping, 13th October
item.description:
Resident called report his neighbour who continuously dumping rubbish in rear alleyway next to his property i'e household waste, furniture and garden waste. Please can we inspect and advise caller.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Burns Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Womens toilet is blocked, 13th October
item.description:
The women's toilet cubicle is not working as there is a blockage. The cubicle has been closed to the public.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North End Road, Golders Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The tree is to big for the street and overgrown, 13th October
item.description:
The tree isn’t in line with the other Birchwood Trees on the street. The tree is much to big, it’s overgrown and the leaves are a nuisance falling into our property and neighbouring properties. The tree roots have lifted the pavement, which has had a tarmac job done over it. This hasn’t really solved the issue as it is starting to crack and there are loose paving stones which is a trip hazard to pedestrians. This is health and safety.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birchwood Avenue, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sweep and litter pick..service road, 13th October
item.description:
Barson close, service road..to be swept and litter picked.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barson Close, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is too big and not balanced. Poses a danger., 13th October
item.description:
Some years ago, this tree split because of disease. Thankfully, no one was injured by the boughs that fell. Since then (10 years? More?), it has never been pruned. Now, it is very large and lop-sided. I spoke to a private tree surgeon recently who also expressed concern, saying it is obvious that the tree is still diseased. I think it should be seen to. I've lived next to it for 25 years. I don't ever remember it being pruned. Many people park under it and children walk to school on the path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prestbury Square, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Bollards knocked over and unlit

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London

item.title: Canisters, 13th October
item.description:
4 canisters have been dumped in our close outside number 19 and have remained there for over a week. I don’t want to put them in any of my waste bins as I do not know if they are pressurised and need special disposal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Calvert Close, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Anti semetic grafitti, 13th October
item.description:
Despite reporting this (again) anonymously at 21:23 (ref 8286444) on Sunday 12th Oct and receiving an email at 1310 on Monday 13th Oct upon walking past the area at 1324 new grafitti has appeared and is again in need of remedial attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1,3, Robin Way, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Traffic lights turned, 13th October
item.description:
Traffic signals on Park St and Oxford streets have turned so traffic coming up Park Street are getting a green light meant for Oxford St eastbound. I was there twice today and almost saw two collisions. Needs sorting ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oxford Street, Mayfair, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No cleaning service on the estate for over 6 months, 13th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Staveley Close, Hackney, London

item.title: SK Open Space behind hedge on Malvern Rd near postbox and Wordsworth House, 13th October
item.description:
There is a new squatter camp in the park with substantial shelters already established and squatters intimidating residents. The squatter problems earlier this year grew rapidly, with criminal activity too. This camp needs to be cleared asap before more arrive.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load (Parks)
